articles.description: “A maximum of 90 slots are available with the five teams, with 30 being slotted for overseas players,” BCCI secretary says.
articles.content: NEW DELHI: Five teams participating in the inaugural Womens Premier League Twenty20 cricket tournament will bid for 409 cricketers from across the world next week, Indias cricket board announced on T… [+1358 chars]
